de.exobros.exogdx.sbg

Class LoadingState

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.exobros.exogdx.sbg.GameState
      • de.exobros.exogdx.sbg.LoadingState

  • public class LoadingState
extends GameState
    Author:
    Exobros The State that a StateBasedgame starts in by default. makes the AssetManager of the corresponding AssetManager load the Queued Resources shows the progress in a loading Bar

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LoadingState() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void init()
      Is called by onCreation Queues the Essentials which are by default the LoadingScreen background and the loading Bar Texture Loads the Queued Essentials Initializes the Camera and the SpriteBatch Queues the normal Resources
      void onEnter()
      Is Called upon entering this State
      void onLeave()
      Is called upon leaving this State
      void render()
      Renders the background and the LoadingBar Lets the AssetManager load part of the Queued Resources.
      void update(float delta)
      Is called by the corresponding StateBaseGames UpdateThread Does nothing

      • update

        public void update(float delta)
        Is called by the corresponding StateBaseGames UpdateThread Does nothing
        Specified by:
        update in class GameState
        Parameters:
        delta - The time that passed since the last call of update() in ms

      • render

        public void render()
        Renders the background and the LoadingBar Lets the AssetManager load part of the Queued Resources. (OpenGL is required for loading the Resources so loading is called in render method)
        Specified by:
        render in class GameState
